channel.title: Project: CH34T3R SC4P3 - Now Recruiting!
channel.description:
[img]http://i25.tinypic.com/25im73d.jpg[/img]
I've noticed lately that almost every server on these forums anymore is running off of Project Czar and I am ready for a change. I'm going to create my own new server series with the help of coders, graphics creators, BETA testers, forum moderators and administrators aswell as in-game moderators and administrators and hosters. This server series will have equal power in: Economy, Skills/Rewards, and Drops from high leveled NPC's. My goal is to make a realistic RuneScape style of server and another one with more commands and un-realistic things.
As you can tell I look like a noob because of my account on here. But actually I know quite a bit about Java Code and how it works in this area of it. The thing is I will need coders for other problems/projects to add on. I could add a mini-game but I would rather a coder with more knowledge do it instead. I used to be able to host my own server until I switched my Internet Service Provider and now I cannot port forward at all. Trust me, i've tried. So that means I will be needing 1 to 2 hosters. Hosters will get a copy of the server in CLOSED FORM. That way they cannot just take the server away from us.
Server Statistics: [code]-Using RichScape V2 - Thanks Rich' -Hopefully adding Clan Chat -Creating working client for server -Making the client into a webclient -Changing prices and stats of items -Making 2 Servers, one economy based, 1 command based -Adding Mini-Games -Creating an area for a BETA version of Bounty hunter -Creating a realistic version of God Wars -Hosting could be 24/7 Depends on hosters -Rares will have a realistic price like regular RuneScape -Godswords will have the actual special attack and Stats -Barrows has the effects -Visage - Dragonfire shield making -Will change drop rate of visage and other rare items -Will adjust the HP and CB level of major bosses so it's realistic -Going to adjust XP rate on economy based server so it's nearly realistic -Fully working skills not including hunter or summoning[/code]
These are the current Jobs Available: [code]Hoster In-Game Admin In-Game Mod Forum Admin Forum Mod BETA Tester Coder[/code]
To sign up for this server project fill out an application and post it here, E-Mail me it, or PM me it.
Application: [code]Which Job are you wanting? How often are you online? Do you think you can contribute to this server? If you said yes, tell me how you could. How long have you done a job like the one you've chosen? What will be your Forum/In-Game Username? Do you know anyone else that you think would be able to contribute?[/code]
If you've posted an application or sent one to me I should get back to you on whether you have been accepted or not. If you've been accepted I will send you a link to the CH34T3R SC4P3 Forums. I hope you all wish to join or support us in creating a new server series!
I already have a forums set up. You can PM me for details or E-Mail me at: [email]CH34T3R@live.com[/email]

item.title: Project: CH34T3R SC4P3 - Now Recruiting!
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Which Job are you wanting? coder
How often are you online? 3hrs/day
Do you think you can contribute to this server? ye
If you said yes, tell me how you could. make cool stuff
How long have you done a job like the one you’ve chosen? 2yrs
What will be your Forum/In-Game Username? same as here
Do you know anyone else that you think would be able to contribute? no
